text: Rik Battaglia (Caterino Bertaglia; 18 February 1927 – 27 March 2015) was an Italian movie actor. He was born at Corbola, near Rovigo, Veneto. He was known for his roles in Old Shatterhand (1963), Die Pyramide des Sonnengottes (1965), Das Vermächtnis des Inka (1965), Black Jack (1968), Winnetou und sein Freund Old Firehand, Winnetou und Shatterhand im Tal der Toten (1968), White Fang (1973), Challenge to White Fang (1974) in and A Man Called Blade (1977). ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Veneto
title: Rik Battaglia
